name: sad kitty
sizes_available: sad kitty is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 2 inches tall and 4 inches long.
notes:
this chenille plush no-sew sad kitty crochet pattern is the perfect amigurumi project for cat lovers.

sad kitty crochet along video
right hand: https://youtu.be/dex8zqajd-i
left hand: https://youtu.be/0mcwy2k4a6g

beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques:
-magic circle
-single crochet
-increasing  (2 stitches into one stitch)
-decreasing  (join 2 stitches into 1)
-half double crochet
-x-small bobble
-bobble
-fastening off

this advanced beginner no-sew pattern is written in u.s. crochet terms, complete with clear instructions, pictures, and a video tutorial to help you along the way. sad kitty is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds. i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round. sad kitty is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 2 inches tall. be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used. gauge is not particularly important, just be consistent with the tension you are using. and most importantly, have fun!

supplies needed to make sad kitty:
-super bulky (6) weight yarn (i used premier parfait chunky chenille yarn) 
-small amount of yarn for the nose and eyes.
-h (5mm) crochet hook
-two 14mm plastic safety eyes (not recommended for children under 3 years old)
-polyfil or stuffing of your choice
-yarn needle
-embroidery needle
-scissors
-locking stitch markers (optional)
